medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Weakness first noted in the ankles and feet 5 months previously, progressed to involve knees and hips, and patient had been unable to walk without support for the prior 2 months. Grip strength had weakened, with numbness in toes and fingertips. Progressive swelling in feet and ankles was noted. Patient reported unintentional weight loss over 6 months.
medical_history.past_medical_history: 20-year history of hypothyroidism, hypertension, and seasonal allergies.
medical_history.social_history: No history of smoking, alcohol abuse, or illicit drug use. Patient is married, unemployed, and lives in the midwestern United States.
